pages.text: The $(d)Super Lubricant Tincture$() can be crafted with any boot item to make them $(3)completely negate friction$() when worn.$(br2)That means if you start moving, you won't stop!
pages.title: Super Lubricant Tincture

pages.text: You can craft Lubricated boots with a Water Bottle to wash the lubricant off.
